sub_title: Sales Area manager France, Israel and Palestine
summary:
Who I am:
I am a pragmatic technician who developed into sales area management. Good analytical skills, outgoing, reliable and enjoying to help customers meeting their long-term requirements. Results oriented and achieve this by taking initiatives and intensive teamwork with colleagues, customers and business partners. Traveling over the world, working numerous projects for CPM, I have learned to respect and communicate effectively with people from the various European, Asian, North American and North African cultures. 

What I have done:
Developed from mechanical engineer and equipment commissioning specialist to sales area management in the animal feed-, bio-energy-, fertilizer- and RDF industries. Through the World Wide CPM organization, working numerous international projects, my engineering- and commercial skills developed to a senior level. Recognized business opportunities for Salmonella control in the animal feed industries which materialized by developing the third generation heat treatment equipment and the application of extrusion roll speed measurement for optimizing pellet mill performances. As sales area manager worked for CPM Europe in The Netherlands, Turkey, Morocco, Algeria, Tunisia and currently in France, Israel and Palestine.

Where do I add the most value:
In a commercial role which benefits from the present engineering- and commercial skills, in a business culture where taking initiatives is being encouraged. At customers who are studying the optimum solution for grinding, conditioning and pelleting animal feed, wood pellets, fertilizer pellets or RDF pellets in order to meet there financial objectives.

treasury_media.description: The requirement for Salmonella control in animal feeds encouraged numerous equipment manufacturers to develop a solution. Today, we typically recognize 3 heat treatment equipment generations which are still available on the market for new projects....

treasury_media.description: The traditional methods of reducing microbial contamination in feed raw materials have been compromised within the EU recently with the ban on the incorporation of formaldehyde as a feed additive (PT4). Within the EU this is being linked to an...

treasury_media.title: Cleanest feed mill in the world expands capacity
treasury_media.description: Poultry breeding company Aviagen expands the capacity of America's First Feedmill designed to deliver pathogen-free poultry feed.

treasury_media.title: Flexibility through oversizing
treasury_media.description: Better control of particle size. This can be achieved with the latest hammer mill,  developed by CPM. The secret behind this? A large rotor, a low rpm, the use of eight screens with different diameters, and a total screen  surface area of 9.6 m2.

treasury_media.description: Presentation of the new pellet mill CPM 7936-14 series during the VIV 2018 exhibition in Utrecht. During the interview the specific differences of this new machine and its advantages for our customers are being explained.

profile_positions.description: CPM is helping its customers in the animal nutrition- and bio-energy industries to achieve the highest productivity. We do this by providing the most reliable grinding- and pelleting equipment producing high capacities at very low maintenance cost
profile_positions.title: Sales Area manager
